    • LoadTexture

      public static org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture LoadTexture​(String path, String fileType)
      Loads a custom picture (preferably of 64 x 64 pix) into the game and can display it on the main frame.
      Parameters:
      path - -> example: C:\Users\Paul\Desktop\image.png
      fileType - -> PNG, JPEG, etc. It only accepts PNG though.
      Returns:
      the said texture

    • QuickLoad

      public static org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture QuickLoad​(String name)
      A quick solution to load a texture in the game. Instead of writing LoadTexture("Resources/Image.png", "PNG"), you just type QuickLoad("Image.png") and it makes your life much easier.
      Parameters:
      name - -> name of the said image that you want to incorporate in the game
      Returns:
      the texture of the image

    • DrawQuadTexRotate

      public static void DrawQuadTexRotate​(org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture tex, float x, float y, float width, float height, float angle)
      This method is used to animate the rotation of the towers which are used to shoot the enemies;
      Parameters:
      tex - -> tower's texture
      x -
      y -
      width -
      height -
      angle -
